attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dear Prime Minister Mr Brown will the British government ever review the smoking ban in England and Wales ? As you are aware local pubs are closing down because many people what do smoke have to go outside in the cold and wet being time of year and high cost of beer as well is it the end of the local pub ?  From a non smoker              Mr Daniel Clarke

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
